title: ‘Lightyear’ and Five Signs of the Streaming Movie Apocalypse
description:
Sean and Amanda break down 'Lightyear,' the one new movie in theaters while a whole bundle of new movies are streaming at home right now, and what that tells us about the state of the movie business.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
